name: Twitter Ranking
author: Plugitter

sections.description:
Shows a ranking of your twitter followers in a widget. You can sort the results clicking in the table header.

Multilingual Support

plugitter.pot file included for easy translation in your own language. es_ES included in the distribution.
sections.installation:
1. decompress the zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Drag’n drop the widget to the sidebar in the Widgets area.
  4. Configure your Tweeter Screen Name and How Many followers you want to rank
  5. Select if you want to display the Tweets column.
sections.faq:
Who are all those people in the ranking? I don’t know any of them!

You have to configure the widget with your Twitter Screen Name. If you don’t put a Screen Name, Plugitter will display a default ranking.

Ok, I’ve put my Twitter Screen Name, but the widget doesn’t show anything

The first time Plugitter is displayed, it asks our server to build a ranking for you. Give it five minutes and you have your personalized ranking.

My followers are all mixed up, can i separate them in categories?

As a mater of fact, you can. Just go to our home page and you will have access to an interface to sort your followers. Categories you create will be displayed on Plugitter automagically.

Cool! Is there anything else you can do for me?

If you agree, we can tweet to your followers, like: Hey @follower, you are #1 in my ranking! check here http://my.wpblog.com

Why on earth I will want to do that?

To increase trafic to your site, of course. Contact us via mail and we will explain in detail.
